categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Soara Antana was a high-ranking Jedi Master of the Jedi Order in the final years of the Galactic Republic. Regarded as a lightsaber virtuoso, Antana was one of the Masters who held prestige classes for Padawans in specialized halls and instruction rooms of the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant.

Soara Antana was introduced in the Dorling Kindersley reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations, published in 2016, where the Jedi Master was mentioned in a segment written by Simon Beecroft. Antana's first appearance in the Star Wars Legends continuity was the junior novel Jedi Quest: The Way of the Apprentice, which was written by Jude Watson and published in 2002.
